extendedInfo.description: The main objective of this application is to achieve high performance, good responsiveness, and fantastic WP7 look and feel, keeping attention on every detail.This application is still under development, so please do not hesitate to contact me in case there is any problem. I always try to give a quick response to all the submitted enquiries. With the help of people who are supporting me, donating and providing the assistance, I will be adding more and more features every week.Do you have any question, a feature request or a bug to report, please go to http://messagingmetro.uservoice.com/ and join the community, let's make this app awesome.Current free functionalities:- Dynamic and fast loading of all the inbox and outbox messages in a single list- Visualisation of the conversation with any contact- Messages forwarding and resend- Copy and paste feature- Drafts- Automatic split messaging functionality- Offline sending; the text will be sent once the signal is recovered- Accessing to a call option and contact details from the conversation list- Ability to add an unknown phone number to an existing contact, or create a new contact- Fullscreen- Setting up the clock to 12/24 hours format- Setting up the date format as month/day or day/month- Delivery reports with toast message or integrated with the system notification bar- Adjusting settings for enter button: new line, hide keyboard, send message, send + bottom bar- Customising all the font sizes and types- Signature- Accessing Messaging Metro via the People/Contacts system's application- Contact assist- Messages to groups- AnimationsCurrent limitations:- There is no support for MMS, it will be added for the v1.0Reward for those who support my work you will be able to:- Activate incoming message notifications (by vibration, tone, and custom led color), and fast popup reply- Custom tone per contact- Delete conversations and single messages- Activate the option of wakening up the screen when a new message is received- Change the theme to light and dark pattern- Choose one of the many accent colours availablePlease note that due to a Google Play limitation, I am unable to respond to all the submitted comments. Special thanks to everyone who has supported me! I'll keep working for you.Available in:- English- Spanish- Catalan- Portuguese, thanks to Marcio Andrade- Brazilian, thanks to Marcio Andrade- French, thanks to Clement Taverne, Dimitri and Jimmy Holzer- Polish, thanks to Proove and Unaffectef- Slovak, thanks to MartinB- Italian, thanks to Marklocci79 and Mandragola- Russian, thanks to Anna Kravcova and Victor Pogrebnyak- Hungarian, thanks to Erdei Attila- German, thanks to Holger Harzer- Turkish, thanks to ManoMachine- Czech, thanks to David Ruml- Korean, thanks to SILPH- Swedish thanks to Nattugglan70- Svenska thanks to Nattugglan70* If you want to collaborate with or fix any language, go to http://crowdin.net/project/messaging-metro/invite

reviews.title: One honestly good APP
reviews.comment: Perfection, it is capable for all needs that I have for a SMS app. Most importantly, it is so smooth, much better than the ones I used.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Love this clean minimal UI. Excellent messaging app. Customisable. Well done
reviews.author: Dave Pinson

reviews.title: Quite good..
reviews.comment: This app is the best Windows Phone Sms that I have downloaded but the fact that you cant even delete the messages? Makes me mad. So far the app is great. Can you lower the beer? hihihi. Its quite expensive here in the Philippines. LOL! =)
reviews.author: Cedric Errol Suarez

reviews.comment: Meh
reviews.author: Joseph Alexander

reviews.title: Well...
reviews.comment: Its a nice idea and all, and it is what I came here looking for. But the animations are really terrible. There really aren\'t any. So... Yeah. Those are my suggestions.
reviews.author: Sam H

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: How come most of the basic functions need to be paid? Even the pop-up notifier needs donation. Update came, I thought we can get to avail some free basic functions but then none. Other than that, this is my favorite sms app. I just hope in the next update, we can have some of those basic functions for free...
reviews.author: Ralph Gerard Cadiz

reviews.title: Greedy
reviews.comment: Itd be 100000 times better if we didnt have to pay for notifications. Too greedy
reviews.author: Amy Camejo

reviews.title: Touch Wiz MMS App Sucks
reviews.comment: My Samsung is the best in terms of performance but their UI sucks... Big Time..  Loved the subtle metro messaging app on windows phone.. Great deal here.. Must try readers
reviews.author: Akhil Somaraj

reviews.title: Just missing one thing
reviews.comment: Looks awesome, cool features, all it needs is MMS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor app
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t receive messages from network operators & other senders
reviews.author: Utsav Kumar

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love this app i wish i could have the extra features but im only 12
reviews.author: Luke Lighthart

reviews.title: aswome...
reviews.comment: very much like windows..
reviews.author: Rajesh R.G

reviews.comment: Why Do Updates Always Break the Keyboard Enter Action??? Best Metro Messaging App!\tWish it had mms but other than that it\'s perfect. Oh and more updates! Updates need done work. They always break stuff.
reviews.author: Paul Doetsch

reviews.title: :D
reviews.comment: Love it !! It would be nice to have multiwindow support though.
reviews.author: Jay Musick

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I like it
reviews.author: Muhammad Davied

reviews.title: Lovely and clean
reviews.comment: Great idea and well executed! Love the minimal design, works really well!
reviews.author: Daniel Vernon

reviews.title: This can be good
reviews.comment: But asking for a donation just to let me delete messages isn\'t going to make me buy it. This is a simple feature that should be free.
reviews.author: albin sjostrom

reviews.title: Very Nice and Very Faster
reviews.comment: I\'m very like this app., please fix \'force close\' this  apps., on SAMSUNG GALAXY POCKET
reviews.author: Afrivari Oscar

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Now I\'m a huge fan of the idea, but the fact that almost all but the most basic functions are sponsors only. I feel like this app should just be a paid app because only basic functions are free.
reviews.author: Andrew Lee

reviews.title: Ok.. But asks a lot fr users
reviews.comment: The overall appearance looks ok. But almost half of the customizable things arent accessible unless u donate. Messaging7 is a lot better. Hope the dev will be a bit more generous for functions.
reviews.author: francis lim
